name: Acl
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl
description:
File Access Control List

Represents a File’s Access Control List.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

methods.name: reload!
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#reload!
methods.description: Reloads all Access Control List data for the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.reload!

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.owners.each { |owner| puts owner }

require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.readers.each { |reader| puts reader }

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "heidi@example.net"
file.acl.add_owner "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "authors@example.net"
file.acl.add_owner "group-#{email}"

params.name: entity
params.description:
The entity holding the permission, in one of the following forms:

  • user-userId
  • user-email
  • group-groupId
  • group-email
  • domain-domain
  • project-team-projectId
  • allUsers
  • allAuthenticatedUsers

params.name: generation
params.description:
When present, selects a specific revision
of this object. Default is the latest version.

examples.caption: Grant access to a user by pre-pending "user-" to an email:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "heidi@example.net"
file.acl.add_reader "user-#{email}"

examples.caption: Grant access to a group by pre-pending "group-" to an email
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "authors@example.net"
file.acl.add_reader "group-#{email}"

params.description:
The entity holding the permission, in one of the following forms:

  • user-userId
  • user-email
  • group-groupId
  • group-email
  • domain-domain
  • project-team-projectId
  • allUsers
  • allAuthenticatedUsers

params.name: generation
params.description:
When present, selects a specific revision
of this object. Default is the latest version.

methods.name: delete
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#delete
methods.description: Permanently deletes the entity from the file’s access control list.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
email = "heidi@example.net"
file.acl.delete "user-#{email}"

params.name: entity
params.description:
The entity holding the permission, in one of the following forms:

  • user-userId
  • user-email
  • group-groupId
  • group-email
  • domain-domain
  • project-team-projectId
  • allUsers
  • allAuthenticatedUsers

params.name: generation
params.description:
When present, selects a specific revision
of this object. Default is the latest version.

methods.name: auth!
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#auth!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the authenticatedRead predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.auth!

methods.name: owner_full!
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#owner_full!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the bucketOwnerFullControl predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.owner_full!

methods.name: owner_read!
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#owner_read!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the bucketOwnerRead predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.owner_read!

methods.name: private!
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#private!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the private predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.private!

methods.name: project_private!
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#project_private!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the projectPrivate predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.project_private!

methods.name: public!
title: Gcloud
Storage
File
Acl#public!
methods.description: Convenience method to apply the publicRead predefined ACL rule to the file.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
storage = gcloud.storage

bucket = storage.bucket "my-bucket"

file = bucket.file "path/to/my-file.ext"
file.acl.public!
